description.brazilian: Comece sua jornada.
description.french: Commencez votre voyage.
description.latam: Empieza tu viaje.

description.brazilian: Obtenha o item pessoal da Diane.
description.french: Obtenez l'objet personnel de Diane.
description.latam: Obtén el objeto personal de Diane.
description.schinese: 获得戴安娜的个人物品。
description.tchinese: 獲得黛安娜的私人物品。

description.brazilian: Passe mais tempo com a Lara.
description.french: Passez du temps supplémentaire avec Lara.
description.latam: Pasa tiempo extra con Lara.

description.brazilian: Tire uma foto da Becky.
description.french: Prenez une photo de Becky.
description.latam: Toma una foto de Becky.

description.brazilian: Brincando no parque.
description.french: Jouer dans un parc.
description.latam: Juega en un parque.

description.brazilian: Ganhe um jogo contra a Becky.
description.french: Gagnez un jeu contre Becky.
description.latam: Gana un juego contra Becky.

description.brazilian: Encontre um quimono para a Nicole.
description.french: Trouvez un kimono pour Nicole.
description.latam: Encuentra un kimono para Nicole.

description.brazilian: Envie uma FOTO para a Becky.
description.french: Envoyez une PHOTO à Becky.
description.latam: Envía una FOTO a Becky.

description.brazilian: Encontre um item incomum no quarto da Becky.
description.english: Spot an unusual item in Becky’s room.
description.french: Repérez un objet inhabituel dans la chambre de Becky.
description.latam: Encuentra un objeto inusual en la habitación de Becky.
description.russian: Заметьте необычный предмет в комнате Бекки.
description.schinese: 在贝基的房间里发现一个不寻常的物品。
description.tchinese: 在貝琪的房間發現一個不尋常的物品。
description.turkish: Becky’nin odasında alışılmadık bir eşyayı fark et.

description.brazilian: Aproveite uma noite com a Diane.
description.english: Enjoy an evening out with Diane.
description.french: Passez une soirée avec Diane.
description.latam: Disfruta una salida nocturna con Diane.
description.schinese: 和戴安娜一起享受一个夜晚。
description.tchinese: 與黛安娜共度一個夜晚。
description.turkish: Diane ile dışarıda bir akşam geçir.

description.brazilian: Vá para a balada com a Becky.
description.french: Allez en boîte avec Becky.
description.latam: Ve al club con Becky.

description.brazilian: Provoque a Lara.
description.french: Taquinez Lara.
description.latam: Molesta a Lara.

description.brazilian: Receba a Christine.
description.french: Accueillez Christine.
description.latam: Recibe a Christine.

description.brazilian: Visite a Lara na casa dela.
description.french: Rendez visite à Lara chez elle.
description.latam: Visita a Lara en su casa.

description.brazilian: Saia com a Lin.
description.french: Sortez avec Lin.
description.latam: Sal con Lin.

description.brazilian: Passe tempo com a Jasmine.
description.french: Passez du temps avec Jasmine.
description.latam: Pasa tiempo con Jasmine.

description.brazilian: Confesse para a Diane sobre o jogo.
description.english: Confess to Diane about the game.
description.french: Avouez à Diane l'existence du jeu.
description.latam: Confiesa a Diane sobre el juego.
description.schinese: 向戴安娜坦白关于游戏的事情。
description.tchinese: 向黛安娜坦白遊戲的事情。

description.brazilian: Acorde no momento certo com a Becky.
description.english: Wake up at just the right moment with Becky.
description.french: Réveillez-vous au bon moment avec Becky.
description.latam: Despierta en el momento justo con Becky.
description.russian: Проснитесь в нужный момент рядом с Бекки.
description.schinese: 和贝基在正好对的时间醒来。
description.tchinese: 在正好合適的時刻與貝琪醒來。
description.turkish: Becky ile tam doğru anda uyan.

description.brazilian: Faça a escolha inesperada com a Eleni.
description.french: Faites le choix inattendu avec Eleni.
description.latam: Elige lo inesperado con Eleni.
description.schinese: 和艾琳妮做出意外的选择。
description.tchinese: 和艾蓮妮做出出乎意料的選擇。

description.brazilian: Decida ficar com a Cassandra.
description.french: Décidez de rester avec Cassandra.
description.latam: Decide quedarte con Cassandra.
description.schinese: 决定和卡珊德拉留在一起。
description.tchinese: 決定與卡珊德拉待在一起。

description.brazilian: Decida investigar e descubra um esquilo.
description.english: Choose to investigate and uncover a squirrel.
description.french: Enquêtez et découvrez un écureuil.
description.latam: Elige investigar y descubre una ardilla.
description.schinese: 选择调查并发现一只松鼠。
description.tchinese: 選擇調查並發現一隻松鼠。
description.turkish: Araştırmayı seç ve bir sincabı ortaya çıkar.

description.brazilian: Termine de ler dois livros.
description.french: Finissez de lire deux livres.
description.latam: Termina de leer dos libros.

description.brazilian: Ofereça seu casaco para a Jasmine.
description.french: Offrez votre veste à Jasmine.
description.latam: Ofrécele tu chaqueta a Jasmine.
description.schinese: 把你的夹克递给贾斯敏。

description.brazilian: Entre escondido na biblioteca após o anoitecer.
description.english: Sneak into the library after dark.
description.french: Faufilez-vous dans la bibliothèque après la tombée de la nuit.
description.latam: Entra a escondidas en la biblioteca de noche.
description.schinese: 天黑后偷偷潜入图书馆。

description.brazilian: Visite a Lara sem bater na porta.
description.french: Rendez visite à Lara sans frapper.
description.latam: Visita a Lara sin tocar primero.

description.brazilian: Confira o setup gamer da Lin.
description.french: Découvrez la configuration de jeu de Lin.
description.latam: Revisa la configuración gamer de Lin.

description.brazilian: Ajude a Cassandra na rotina de exercícios.
description.english: Help Cassandra with her exercise routine.
description.french: Aidez Cassandra dans sa routine d'exercice.
description.latam: Ayuda a Cassandra con su rutina de ejercicios.
description.schinese: 帮助卡珊德拉进行她的日常锻炼。
description.tchinese: 幫助卡珊德拉完成她的鍛鍊。

description.brazilian: Cubra a Diane enquanto ela dorme.
description.french: Couvrez Diane pendant qu'elle dort.
description.latam: Cubre a Diane mientras duerme.
description.schinese: 在戴安娜睡觉时给她盖上被子。
description.tchinese: 在黛安娜睡著時為她蓋被子。

description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe da Nicole por ela.
description.english: Defeat Nicole’s boss on her behalf.
description.french: Battez le patron de Nicole à sa place.
description.latam: Derrota al jefe de Nicole en su nombre.
description.tchinese: 代表妮可擊敗她的老闆。
description.turkish: Nicole’ün patronunu onun adına alt et.

description.brazilian: Elogie tanto a Nicole quanto a Becky.
description.french: Faites un compliment à Nicole et Becky.
description.latam: Halaga tanto a Nicole como a Becky.
description.russian: Сделайте комплимент и Николь, и Бекки.
description.turkish: Hem Nicole’e hem de Becky’ye iltifat et.

description.brazilian: Fique ao lado da Nicole durante a tempestade.
description.english: Stay by Nicole’s side during the storm.
description.french: Restez aux côtés de Nicole pendant l'orage.
description.latam: Quédate al lado de Nicole durante la tormenta.
description.russian: Останьтесь рядом с Николь во время шторма.
description.schinese: 在暴风雨期间待在妮可身边。

description.brazilian: Revele um pouco mais.
description.french: Révélez-en un peu plus.
description.latam: Revela un poco más.

description.brazilian: Visite a Christine na casa dela.
description.french: Rendez visite à Christine chez elle.
description.latam: Visita a Christine en su casa.
description.schinese: 去克里斯蒂娜的住处拜访。

description.brazilian: Diga para a Eleni que você é escritor.
description.french: Dites à Eleni que vous êtes un écrivain.
description.latam: Dile a Eleni que eres escritor.
description.schinese: 告诉艾琳妮你是一名作家。

description.brazilian: Culpe o Caleb por algo que ele não fez.
description.english: Blame Caleb for something he didn’t do.
description.french: Blâmez Caleb pour quelque chose qu'il n'a pas fait.
description.latam: Culpa a Caleb de algo que no hizo.
description.russian: Обвините Калеба в том, чего он не делал.
description.schinese: 责怪迦勒做了他没做过的事。
description.tchinese: 把某件他沒做的事怪到卡雷布身上。
description.turkish: Caleb’i yapmadığı bir şey için suçla.

description.brazilian: Seja expulso da biblioteca.
description.english: Get kicked out of the library.
description.french: Faites-vous expulser de la bibliothèque.
description.latam: Te echan de la biblioteca.

description.brazilian: Bloqueie o número da Christine no seu celular.
description.english: Block Christine’s number on your phone.
description.french: Bloquez le numéro de Christine sur votre téléphone.
description.latam: Bloquea el número de Christine en tu teléfono.
description.schinese: 在手机上阻止克里斯蒂娜的号码。
description.tchinese: 在手機上封鎖克莉絲汀的號碼。

description.brazilian: Experimente os tacos duvidosos da Diane.
description.french: Goûtez les tacos douteux de Diane.
description.latam: Prueba los cuestionables tacos de Diane.
description.schinese: 尝试戴安娜可疑的墨西哥卷饼。
description.tchinese: 嘗試黛安娜可疑的塔可。

description.brazilian: Salve a Becky de um sequestrador.
description.french: Sauvez Becky d'un kidnappeur.
description.latam: Salva a Becky de un secuestrador.

description.brazilian: Seja preso pela polícia.
description.french: Faites-vous arrêter par la police.
description.latam: Te arresta la policía.

description.brazilian: Mude os relacionamentos dos personagens.
description.french: Changer les relations entre les personnages
description.latam: Cambia las relaciones de los personajes.

description.brazilian: Leve um golpe direto da Nicole.
description.english: Take a direct hit from Nicole.
description.french: Recevoir un coup direct de Nicole.
description.latam: Recibe un golpe directo de Nicole.

description.brazilian: A Nicole espia enquanto você está com a Christine.
description.english: Nicole peeks while you’re with Christine.
description.french: Nicole jette un œil pendant que vous êtes avec Christine.
description.latam: Nicole espía mientras estás con Christine.
description.russian: Николь подсматривает, пока вы с Кристиной.
description.schinese: 你和克莉丝汀在一起时，妮可在一旁偷看。
description.tchinese: 當你和克莉絲汀在一起時，妮可偷偷看了。

description.brazilian: Veja a Nicole usando seu quimono.
description.french: Voir Nicole porter son kimono.
description.latam: Ve a Nicole usando su kimono.
description.schinese: 看到妮可穿着她的和服。

description.brazilian: Veja a Nicole relaxando no banho.
description.english: Catch Nicole relaxing in the bath.
description.french: Surprendre Nicole se relaxant dans le bain.
description.latam: Atrapa a Nicole relajándose en la bañera.
description.schinese: 撞见妮可在浴缸里放松。
description.tchinese: 撞見妮可在浴缸中放鬆。

description.brazilian: Compartilhe um momento secreto com a Jasmine no cinema.
description.english: Share a hidden moment with Jasmine at the movies.
description.french: Partager un moment caché avec Jasmine au cinéma.
description.latam: Comparte un momento oculto con Jasmine en el cine.
description.russian: Разделите тайный момент с Жасмин в кино.
description.schinese: 在电影院与茉莉共享一个隐秘的时刻。
description.tchinese: 在電影院與茉莉分享一個隱藏的時刻。
description.turkish: Sinemada Jasmine ile gizli bir an paylaş.

description.brazilian: Chegue ao final.
description.french: Atteindre LA fin.
description.latam: Llega AL final.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as cenas relacionadas.
description.french: Débloquer toutes les scènes correspondantes.
description.latam: Desbloquea todas las escenas relacionadas.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as cenas relacionadas a pés.
description.french: Débloquer toutes les scènes liées aux pieds.
description.latam: Desbloquea todas las escenas relacionadas con pies.
description.russian: Разблокируйте все сцены, связанные со ступнями.
description.schinese: 解锁所有与足部相关的场景。
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有與腳相關的場景。
description.turkish: Ayakla ilgili tüm sahnelerin kilidini aç.

description.brazilian: Complete todas as cenas focadas na boca.
description.french: Terminer toutes les scènes axées sur la bouche.
description.latam: Completa todas las escenas centradas en la boca.
description.russian: Завершите все сцены, сосредоточенные на рте.
description.schinese: 完成所有以口部为重点的场景。
description.tchinese: 完成所有以嘴為焦點的場景。

description.brazilian: Espie em todos os momentos possíveis.
description.french: Regarder à chaque moment possible.
description.latam: Espía en cada momento posible.
description.schinese: 在每个可能的时刻进行窥视。
description.tchinese: 在每個可能的時刻偷看。
description.turkish: Mümkün olan her anda gizlice bak.

description.brazilian: Passe tempo com todos os personagens principais.
description.english: Spend time with all main characters.
description.french: Passer du temps avec tous les personnages principaux.
description.latam: Pasa tiempo con todos los personajes principales.
description.russian: Проведите время со всеми главными персонажами.
description.schinese: 与所有主要角色共度时光。
description.tchinese: 與所有主要角色共度時光。

description.brazilian: Experimente todos os finais ruins.
description.french: Expérimenter toutes les mauvaises fins.
description.latam: Experimenta todos los finales malos.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as cenas da Lara.
description.french: Débloquer toutes les scènes de Lara.
description.latam: Desbloquea todas las escenas de Lara.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as cenas da Christine.
description.french: Débloquer toutes les scènes de Christine.
description.latam: Desbloquea todas las escenas de Christine.
description.schinese: 解锁所有克莉丝汀的场景。
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有克莉絲汀的場景。

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as cenas do Caleb.
description.french: Débloquer toutes les scènes de Caleb.
description.latam: Desbloquea todas las escenas de Caleb.
description.schinese: 解锁所有凯莱布的场景。
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有卡雷布的場景。

description.brazilian: Seja dominante com a Diane.
description.french: Être dominant avec Diane.
description.latam: Sé dominante con Diane.
description.tchinese: 與黛安娜保持主導地位。

description.brazilian: Chegue à conclusão do jogo.
description.french: Atteindre la conclusion du jeu.
description.latam: Llega a la conclusión del juego.
